text: Ubusanzwe iyo mu Kinyarwanda bavuze ngo umuntu ni umugabo byumvikana ko afite ibitekerezo bizima, yihesha agaciro, afite indangagaciro zo kwanga ikibi agashyira imbere icyiza. Bikaba akarusho noneho iyo koko ari umugabo wubatse, wabyaye, kuko aba atoza abe kugenza atyo.
transcript: ubusanzwe iyo mu kinyarwanda bavuze ngo umuntu ni umugabo byumvikana ko afite ibitekerezo bizima yiheshe agaciro afite indangagaciro zo kwanga ikibi agashyira imbere icyiza bikabakarusha noneho iyo koko ari umugabo wubatse wabyaye kuko abatoza be kugenza bari

text: Muri iki gihe hari ikibazo cyabangavu bari gusambanywa bagaterwa inda imburagihe kandi iyo uganiriye nabo usanga hari benshi baziterwa nabagabo bakuze bakagombye kubabera ababyeyi. Ni ikibazo cyagaragaje umuvuduko uri hejuru mu Rwanda ahagana mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cyumi nakarindwi.
transcript: muri iki gihe hari ikibazo cy'abangavubai gusambanywa bagaterwa inda imburagiye kandi uganiriye na bo usangari benshi baziterwa n'abagabo bakuze bakagombye kubabera ababyeyi ni ikibazo cyagaragaje umuvuduka uri hejuru mu rwanda ahagana mu mwaka y'uhumbi bi nyacumiakarinzwi

text: Minisiteri yUburinganire nIterambere ryUmuryango itangaza ko mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cumi nakarindwi abangavu batewe inda imburagihe bataragira imyaka cumi numunani yamavuko bagera ku bihumbi cumi nabirindwi namaganatatu namirongo itatu nabarindwi; naho mu mu mwaka w'ibihumbi bibiri na cumi numunani baba ibihumbi cumi n'icyenda namagana inani namirongotatu nababiri.
transcript: minisiteri y'buringaniye n'iterambere ry'umuryango itangaza ko mu bihumbi binacumi na karindwi abangavubatewe nda imvura gihe n'abataragiye imyaka cumi munani y'amavuko bagera kuri ibihumbi cumi na birindwi magana atatu namirong itatu nabarindwi naho mu mwaka bibihumbi binacumi n'umunani baba ibihumbi cumi n'icyenda maganinani na mirongo itatu na babiri

text: Mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cumi n'icyenda abazitewe barenga ibihumbi makumwabiri nabitatu, mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na makumwabiriri imibare yabazitewe yerekana ko bagera ku bihumbi cumi n'icyenda naho mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na makumwabiriri narimwe bageze ku bihumbi makumwabiri nabitatu.
transcript: mu mwaka bihumbi bin nacumi icyenda abazitewe barenga iihumbi bakumyari na bitatu naho mu mwaka bihumbi bitu makumyabiri na makumyabiri imibare y'abazitewe yerekana ko bagera ku yumba icumi n'icyenda naho mu mwaka y'ibihumbi bi nabakmyari na rimwe bagize ku bihumbi makumyabiri na bitatu

text: Ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bangavu batewe inda imburagihe bugaragaza ubunyamaswa bwabagabo bagiye babasambanya ku ngufu bakabatera inda, bamwe batitaye ko bangana nabo babyaye.
transcript: hamya bwa bamwe mubangavu batewa inda imburagihe bugaragaza ubunyamaswa bw'abagabo bagiye babasambanya ku ngufu bakabatira inda bamwe baititaye ko bangana nabo babyaye

text: Umwangavu wimyaka cumi nitandatu wo mu murenge wa Muganza mu karere ka Gisagara avuga ko yize mu mashuri abanza ageze mu wa kabiri avamo ajya gukora akazi ko mu rugo bitewe nubukene bwari mu rugo rwabo. Iwabo babyaye abana barindwi we ni imfura muri bo.
transcript: umwangavuga imyaka cumi n'intandatu wo mu murenge wa muganza mu karere ka gisagara avuga ko gize mu mashuri abanza ageze mu wa kabiri avamo ajya gukora akazi ko mu rugo bitewe n'ubukene bwari murugo rwabo iwabo babyaye abana barindwi we n'imfura mu ribu

text: Mu buhamya bwe avuga ko yasambanyijwe numugabo wo mu rugo yakoragamo amufashe ku ngufu mu mwaka w'ibihumbi bibiri nacumi nakarindwi.
transcript: mu buhamya bwe avuga ko yasambanyijwe n'umugabo wo murugo yakoragamo amufashe ku ngufu muri ibi binacumi na karindwi

text: Ati Kubera ko iwacu turi abakene nagiye gukora akazi ko mu rugo kugira ngo njye mbona ibyo kurya. Twakundaga gusigarana mu rugo akansambanya ku ngufu akambwira ngo nimbivuga azanyica.
transcript: ati kuwera ko iwacu turi abakene nagiye gukora akazi ko murugo kugira ngo njye mbona ibyo kurya twakundaga gusigarana mu rugo akansambanya ku ngufu akambwiya ngo ni imbivuga azanyica

text: Avuga ko ikimubabaza ari uko bakimara kumenya ko atwite bahise bamwirukana asubira iwabo mu buzima bwa gikene. Aganira na IGIHE yari ahetse umwana wamezi ane. Ababazwa nuko uwo mugabo nta kintu na kimwe amufasha mu kurera uwo mwana.
transcript: avuga ko ikimubabaza ari uko bakimara kumenya ko atwite bahise bamwirukana asubira iwabo mubuzima bwa gikene aganirana igihe thotcom yari ahetse umwana w'amezi ani abazwa nuko umugabo nta kintu kimwe amufasha mu kurera uwo mwana

text: Undi mwangavu wahaye ubuhamya IGIHE ni uwo mu Karere ka Kayonza; yagaragaje ko yasambanywaga numwarimu umwigisha mu mashuri abanza mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri nacumi numunani.
transcript: undi mwangavu wahaye ubuhamya igihe nuwo mu karere ka kayeyonza yagaragaje ko yasambanyaga n'umwarimu umwigisha mu mashuri abanza muri bibirira cumi n'umunani

text: Uwo mwangavu yize aba kwa nyirasenge ariko muri urwo rugo hacumbikaga umwarimu, noneho akajya amufasha gusubiramo amasomo yumugoroba.
transcript: uwo mwangavu yize aba kwa nyirasenge ariko muri urugorurwo hacumbikaga umwarimu noneho akajya amufasha gusubiramo amasomo y'umugoroba

text: Ati “Masenge yamfataga nabi akanga ko ngira icyo mubwira ngo tuganire kuko iwacu twari abakene.Ubwo yari yarantegetse ko uwo mwarimu agomba kujya anyigisha isomo rya nimugoroba. Yanjyanaga mu nzu yo hanze aho acumbitse akansambanya.”
transcript: ati masengeye yamfataga nabi akanga ko ngira icyo mubwira ngo tuganire kuko iwacu twarabakene ubwo  yarantegetse ko umwarimu agomba kujya anyigisha isomo rya nimugoroba yandyanaga mu nzu yo hanze aho acumbitse akansambanyi

text: Uyu mukobwa avuga ko yageze aho arwara ihahamuka yabona uwo mwarimu agahungabana.
transcript: uyu mukobwa avuga ko yageze aho uyu mukobwa avuga ko yageze aho arwara ihahamuka yabona uwo mwarimu agahungabona

text: Ati “Mu ishuri naramubonaga aje kutwigisha ngahahamuka nkarwara bagahita banjyana hanze. Noneho byageraga nimugoroba amasaha yo kujya kunyigisha ageze nkabura aho mpungira kuko yabaga yaraye ansambanyije yankomerekeje, ntiyumvisha ukuntu agiye kongera agasubiza mu bisebe.”
transcript: ati mu ishuri naramubonagaje kutwigisha ngahahamuka nkarwara bagahita banjyana hanze noneho byageraga nimugoroba amasaha yo kujya kunyigisha ageze nkaburaho mpu ngira kuko yabaga yaraye ansambanyije yankumerekeje nkiyumvisha ukuntu agiye kongeya agasubiza kongera agasubiza mu gisebe

text: Ibibazo yahuye nabyo yabiganirije umuforomo wo ku kigo nderabuzima, aramuhumiriza amufasha kwiyakira. Ubu yamaze kubyara.
transcript: ibibazo yahuye na byo yabiganije umufaromo wo ku kigo nderabuzima aramuhumuriza amufasha kwiyakira uu yamaze kubyara

text: Undi mwangavu wo mu Murenge wa Musambira mu Karere ka Kamonyi avuga ko yatangiye gusamabanywa n’umugabo afite imyaka cumi n'ibiri. Icyo gihe yari umunyeshuri yiga mu mwaka wa Kane w’amashuri abanza. Yamusambanyaga abanje kumushukisha amafaranga.
transcript: undi mwangavuo mu murenge wa musambira mu karere ka kamonyi avuga ko yatangiye gusambanywa n'umugabo afite imyaka cumi n'ibiri icyo gihe yari umunyesuriga mu mwaka wa kane w'amashuri abanzi yamusambanyaga abanje kumushikisha amafaranga

text: Uwo mugabo yaje kumutera inda amwanduza virusi itera Sida. Amaze kumenya ko atwite yahise amureka ndetse ntiyamufasha no kurera umwana.
transcript: uwo mugabo yaje kumutera inda amwanduza virusi itera sida amaze kumenya ko atwite yahise amureka ndetse ntiyamufasha no kurera umwana

text: Ati “Nta kintu yigeze amfasha kuko n’umwana atamwemeye. Kuri ubu nta nubwo tukivugana cyane kuko tudahuza.”
transcript: nta kintuyigeze amfashe ko ni umwana atamwemeye kuri ubu ntani ubwo tukivugana cyane ko tudahuza

text: Undi mukobwa wo mu Karere ka Gisagara yatewe inda mu mwaka wa bibiri na cumi na karindwi ananduzwa Sida n’umugabo ubwo yakoraga akazi ko mu rugo mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
transcript: undi mukobwa wo mu karere ka gisagara yatewe inda mu mwaka wabiri nacumi na kayinzwi ananduzwa sida n'umugabo ubwo yakoraga akazi ko murugo mu mujyi wa kigali

text: Ubwo yahuraga n’Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yari avuye ku Kigo nderabuzima gufata ibiryo n’imiti by’umwana we, kuko agaragaraho imirire mibi n’ibimenyetso byo kugwingira, yamugaragarije ko abayeho mu buzima bushaririye.

text: Yagize ati “Aho nakoraga i Kigali namenyanye n’umugabo wakoraga akazi ko kogosha, yarambwiye ngo njye kumusura, ngezeyo amfata ku ngufu antera inda. Nyuma naramushatse ndamubura, aho nakoraga baranyirukana ngaruka mu rugo.”
transcript: yagize ati aho nakoreraga i kigali namenyanye n'umugabo wakoraga akazi ko kogosha yarambwiye ngo njye kumusura ngezeyo amfata ku ngufu antirinda nyuma naramushatse ndamubure aho aho nakoraga barangirukana ngaruka murugo

text: Umukobwa w’imyaka cumi n'ine y’amavuko wo mu Murenge wa Kitabi mu Karere ka Nyamagabe yahuye n’umunyamakuru wa IGIHE mu mwaka wa bibiri na mwaka w'ibihumbi bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe, atwite inda nkuru yatewe imburagihe.

text: Avuga ko yafashwe ku ngufu n’umugabo utuye hakurya y’iwabo mu Mudugudu wa Subukiniro, amutera inda muri Nzeri bibiri na makumyabiri na makumyabiri ubwo yari yagiye mu ishyamba kwahira ubwatsi bw’amatungo. Icyo gihe yari umunyeshuri yiga mu mwaka wa gatanu w’amashuri abanza.

text: Ati “Yansanze mu ishyamba aho nari ndi kwahira mbona ari kundebana umujinya arangije aramfata. Ni umugabo wari ushinzwe gucunga ibinyomoro ariko ndamuzi.”

text: Repubulika y’Abaturage y’u Bushinwa yohereje Wang Xuekun ngo ahagararire inyungu z’icyo gihugu mu Rwanda asimbuye Ambasaderi Rao Hongwei uherutse gusoza inshingano ze.
transcript: republika y'abaturage y'ubushinwa yohereje wange xecun ngo ahagarare inyungu z'icyo gihugu mu rwanda asimbuye ambasadr raon hongay uherutse gusoza inshingano ze

text: Ambasaderi mushya w’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Wang Xuekun yakiriwe na minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane, Dr Biruta Vincent amushyikiriza kopi z’impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira igihugu cye i Kigali.
transcript: ambasaderi mushya w'ubushimwa mu rwanda wongswekoyakiriwe na ministre w'ububanyi n'amahanga n'ubutwererane dr biruta vencer'amushyikiriza kopi z'impapuro zimwemerera guhagarira igihugu cye i kigali

text: Minisitiri Dr Biruta na Ambasaderi Wang Xuekun kandi bagiranye ibiganiro byibanze ku kurushaho guteza imbere ubufatanye n’umubano mwiza usanzwe hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
transcript: tr dr biruta na ambasaderi wang secun kandi bajyanye ibiganiro byibanze kukurushaho guteza imbere ubufatanye n'umubano mwiza usanzwe hagati y'ibihugu byombi

text: Amb. Rao Hongwei uherutse gusoza inshingano zo guhagarira igihugu cye mu Rwanda yari yazitangiye mu mwaka wa bibiri na cumi na karindwi, mu bikorwa yakoze harimo gukomeza gushimangira umubano w’ ibihugu byombi no kwagura inzego bifatanyamo.
transcript: sabed hawo hongey'uherutse gusoza inshingano zo guhagarinshingano zo guhagararira igihugu cye mu rwanda yari yazi itangiye muri i in acumi na karindwi mu bikorwa yakoze harimo gukomeza gushimangira umubano w'ibihugu byombi no kwagura inzengo bifatanyamo

text: Ambasaderi mushya w’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Wang Xuekun yavutse mu gihumbi kimwe magana cyenda na mirongo itandatu n'umunani akaba afite impamyabushobozi y’ikirenga [PhD] mu bijyanye na Engineering. Abarizwa mu Ishyaka rya Communist Party of China riri ku butegetsi muri icyo gihugu.
transcript: mbasaderi mushya w'ubushimwa mu rwanda wongk gsecun yavutse mu gihmbi kimwe magana cyenda mirongo itandatu n'umunani akaba afite impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga pecd mu bijyanye na ingina ring'abayizwa mu ishyaka rya comye nitist comminis park'ofsiner riri ku butegetsi muri icyo gihugu

text: Ubwo yageraga i Kigali ku nshuro ye ya mbere mu mpera za Gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri, ari kumwe n’umuryango we, Amb Wang yavuze ko ubwo azaba amaze guhabwa uburenganzira bwo guhagararira igihugu cye mu Rwanda azashyira imbere kwagura umubano n’ubuhahirane hagati y’impande zombi.
transcript: o yagiyaga i kigali ku nshuro ye ya mbere mu mpera za gishulasi yibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri arik umwe n'umuryango we ambasaderi wank yavuze ko ubwo azaba bamaze guhabwa uburenganzira bwo guhagararira igihugu cye mu rwanda aza yashyira imbere kwagura umubano n'ubuhahirane hagati y'impande zoni

text: Umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bushinwa umaze igihe kirekire ushingiye ku bufatanye, ubwubahane no gushyigikirana. Mu Ugushyingo bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe, nibwo hizihijwe imyaka mirongo itanu y’umubano mwiza n’ubufatanye bw’impande zombi.
transcript: mubano w'u rwanda n'ubushinwa umaze igihe kiresire ushingiye ku bufatanye ubwubahane no gushyigikirana mu gushyingo bbiri na makumyabiri na rimwe nibwo hizihijwe imyaka mirongo itanu y'umubano mwiza n'ubufatanye bw'impande zombi

text: Ibihugu byombi bifatanya mu mishinga y’ishoramari, ibikorwaremezo, ikoranabuhanga, ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, uburezi, kubaka ubushobozi, ubuzima, ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo, ubuhinzi, umutekano n’indi iteza urwa Gasabo imbere.
transcript: ibihugu byombi bifatanya mu mishinga 'ishoramari ibikorwaremezo ikorananabuhanga ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere uburezi kubaka ubushobozi ubuzima ubucuruzi ubukerarugendo ubuhinzi umutekano n'indi iteza urwa gasabo imbere

text: Mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri, u Bushinwa bwohereje mu Rwanda ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni magana abiri na mirongo inani n'ebyiri z'amadolari mu gihe ibyo u Rwanda rwoherejeyo bingana na miliyoni mirongo itatu numunani na magana arindwi z'amadolari. Ishoramari ryabwo ryageze kuri miliyoni makumyabiri neshatu n'ibihumbi cumi na bitandatu by'amadolari rivuye kuri miliyoni cumi na zirindwi z'amadolari yo muri bibiri na cumi n'icyenda.
transcript: mu mwaka wa bibili nabakumyabiri ubushinwa bwohereje mu rwanda ibicuruzwe bifite agaciro ka miliyoni mgaranmirongo inani niebyiri z'adoradi mu gihe ibyo u rwanda rwoherejeyo bingana na miliyoni mirongo itatu n'umunani n'ibice birindwi by'amadolari ishoramari ryabwo byageze kuri miliyoni makumyabiri n'eshatu n'ibicecumi na bitandatu by'amadolari bivuye k miliyoni cumi nazirindwi z'amadolari byo muri biri na cumi nacumi n'icyenda

text: Mu bijyanye n’ibikorwaremezo, u Bushinwa ni bwo bwatanze inkunga nini mu kubaka imihanda myinshi mu Rwanda; bwafashije igihugu mu iyubakwa ry’ingana na mirongo irindwi ku ijana by’iyo gifite.
transcript: mu bijyanye n'ibikorwayemezo ubushinwa nibwo bwatanze inkunganini mu kubaka imihanda myinshi mu rwanda bwafashije igihugu muyubakwa ringana na mirongo indwi ku ijana by'ibyo gifite

text: Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro (RRA) cyaciye abacuruzi mirongo itatu n'umwe amande ya miliyoni cumi n'umunani n'ibihumbi ijana na mirongo itatu na magana inani na cumi by'amanyarwanda kubera kudakoresha neza ikoranabuhanga rya EBM.
transcript: igo cy'imisoro n'amahoro rwanda reven'otherit cyaciye acuruzi mirongo itatu n'umwe amande y miliyoni icumi n'umunani ihumbi ijana na mirongo itatu maghaninani na cumi by'abanyarwanda kubera kudakoresha neza ikoranabuhanga rya ibiem

text: Nubwo hakigaragara umubare munini w’abacuruzi badakozwa ubu buryo bwo gukoresha EBM, hakaba hari n’ababukoresha nabi Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro (RRA) gikomeza gushyiramo ingufu mu rwego wo kunoza imitangire y’umusoro ku nyongeragaciro (TVA).
transcript: no bwa kigaragara umubare umunini w'abacuruzi badakozwa ubu buryo bwo guoresha i biam hakaba hari n'ababukoresha nabi ikigo cy'igihugu cy'imisoro n'amahoro rwanda raven'othrik gikomeza gushyiramo ingufu mu rwego rwo kunoza imitangire y'umusoro kunyongeragaciro tv'a

text: Mu itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Komiseri Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro (RRA), Bizimana Ruganintwali Pascal, rigaragaza urutonde rw’abacuruzi n’ibihano kuri buri wese kubera kudakoresha neza EBM mu bucuruzi bwabo. Urutonde rwatangajwe kuwa cumi na gatatu Kamena ibihumbi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri,ruriho abacuruzi makumyabiri na batatu batubahirije inshingano zo gukoresha EBM ndetse n’abacuruzi umunani bakoze amakosa yo gutubya umusoro.
transcript: zo ryashyizweho umukono na komiseri mukuru w'ikigo cy'imisora n'amahoro rwanda riveniustrik bizimana ruganintwari pascal rigaragaza urutonde rw'abacuruzi n'ibihano kuri buri wese kubera kudakoresha reza i biem mu bucuruzi bwabourutonde rwatangajwe ku bacumiya gatatu kamena bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri ruriho abaturuzi makumyabiri na batatu batubahirije inshingano zo gukoresha i biem ndetse n'abacuruzi umunani bakoze amakosa yo gutubya umusoro

text: Abacuruzi makumyabiri na batatu batakoresheje inyemezabuguzi ya EBM, umunani muri bo bahanishijwe amande yikubye kabiri, umwe ahanishwa amande yikubye kane, barindwi bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro icumi n’abandi barindwi bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro makumyabiri by’umusoro wose wari wanyerejwe.
transcript: abacuruzi makumnyabiri na batatu batakoresheje inyemezabuguzi ya i biem umunani muri bo bahanishijwe amande yikubye kabiri umwe ahanishwa amande yikubyekanebarindwi bahanisha bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro icumi n'abandi barindwi bahanishwa amande yikubye inshoro amakumyabiri by'umusoro wose wari wanyerejwe

text: Uwaciwe amande ari hejuru ni sosiyete yaciwe miliyoni enye n'ibihumbi magana ane by'amafaranga y'Urwanda nyuma yo gukuba inshuro makumyabiri umusoro wari wanyerejwe,bivuze ko hanyerejwe amafaranga ibihumbi magana biri na makumyabiri na kimwe n'ijana na mirongo inani natandatu y'amanyarwanda
transcript: uwaciwe amanda yari hejuru n'isosiyete yaciwe miliyoni enye n'ibice bineby'amafaranga y'u rwanda nyuma yo gukuba inshuro makumyabiri umusoro wari wanyerejwe  bivuze ko hanyerijwe amafaranga ibihumbi magana abiri n'amakumyabini kimwe n'amafaranga ijana ra mirongelani natandatu y'u rwanda

text: Ku ruhande rw’abatubije umusoro bagatanga inyemezabuguzi zidahwanye n’ibyo abaguzi bakuye mu maduka, harimo batanu bahanishijwe amande yikubye inshuro icumi ku musoro wari wanyerejwe,abandi batatu bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro makumyabiri.
transcript: ande rwatsubije umusoro bagatanga inyemezabuguzi zidahwanye n'ibyo abaguzi bakwuye mu maduka harimo batanu bahanishijwe amande iyikubyinshui icumi ku musoro wari wanyerejwe abandi batatu bahanishwa amande yikubye inshoro makumyabiri

text: Amande yose yaciwe aba bacuruzi bagaragazwa na RRA ni amafaranga asaga miliyoni cumi n'umunani z'amafaranga y'Urwanda.
transcript: manta yose yaciwe aba bacuruzi mbagaragazwa na rwanda revenotherik niya mafaranga asaga miliyoni cumi n'umunani z'amafaranga y'u rwanda

text: Muri bibiri na cumi na gatatu ni bwo mu Rwanda hatangijwe gahunda yo gutanga inyemezabuguzi mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, EBM.
transcript: ri bihui muri ibib na cumi na gatatu nibwo mu rwanda hatangijwe gahunda yo gutanga inyemi izabuguzi mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga i biam

text: RRA igaragaza ko gushyira ahagaragara urutonde rw’abacuruzi badakoresha neza EBM bigamije gukangurira abandi batazikoresha kurushaho kubyitabira cyane ko umucuruzi utayikoresha ahanwa hakurikijwe ibyo itegeko riteganya.
transcript: da reveneoutrik igaragaza ko gushyira ahagaragara urutonde rwaba bacuruzi badakoresha neza e biam bigamije gukangurira abandi batazikoresha kurushaho kubyitabira cyane ko umucuruzi utayikoresha ahanwa hakwikijwe ibyo itegeko riteganywa

text: Mu bihumbi bibiri na cumi n'icyenda, hasohotse itegeko rigena ko n’abantu batabaruye muri TVA batangira gukoresha EBM mu bikorwa byabo bya buri munsi.
transcript: mu bihumbi  nacumi n'icyenda hasohotse itegeko rigena ko n'abantu batabaruye muri tiviay batangira guhoesha i biem mu bikorwa byabo bya buri munsi

text: RRA kandi yakanguriye abaguzi bose gusaba inyemezabuguzi ya EBM ndetse bakibuka no kugenzura ko amafaranga bishyuye ahuye n’ayanditse ku nyemezabwishyu bahawe.
transcript: rwanda reventiotrik yakanguriye abaguzi bose gusaba inyemezabuguzi ya ibiam ndetse bakibuka ko kugenzura ko amafaranga yishyuye ahuye nanditse kunyemezabwishyu bahawe

text: Ni ubutumwa bwatangiwe mu muhango wo gutangiza icyumweru cy’uburezi mu mashuri y’iri torero, wabereye mu Karere ka Bugesera ku wa cumi na gatatu Kamena bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri.
transcript: ni ubutumwa bwatangiwe mu muhango wo gutangiza icyumweru cy'iburezi mu mashuri y'iri torero wabereye mu karere ka bugesera ku wacumi nagatatu kamena biri nabakumyabiri na kabizi

text: Icyumweru cy’uburezi ni ubwa mbere giteguwe ku rwego rwa ADEPR. Ubuyobozi bwavuze ko hatekerejwe no ku kwagura ibikorwa,inzego z’uburezi n’ubuvuzi zikarushaho gushyirwamo imbaraga.
transcript: icyumweru cy'uburezi n' ubwa mbere giteguwe ku rwego rwa adpr'ubuyobozi bwavuze ko hategerejwe no no kukwagura ibikorwa inzego z'uburezi n'ubuvuzi zikarushaho gushyirwamo imbaraga

text: Umushumba Mukuru Wungirije wa ADEPR, Pasiteri Rutagarama Eugène, yavuze ko iri torero ryifuza kubaka uburezi bufite ireme atari ukugira amashuri ameze nk’umutako.
transcript: umusumba mukuru wungirije wa the per pasiteri rutagarama eugan yavuze ko iyi torero byifuza kuba ku burezi bufite ireme atari ukugira amashuri ameze nk'umutako

text: Ati “Ni gahunda itari imenyerewe; impinduka twifuza ntabwo zizareba urwego rumwe rw’ivugabutumwa, hari n’ubumenyi bukenewe. Turi mu mavugurura n’iki twabonye ko ari ngombwa. Ntabwo twifuza kugira ibigo by’imitako ahubwo bigomba kujyana n’ireme ry’uburezi butangirwamo.”
transcript: ati ni gahunda itayimenyerewe impinduka twifuza ntabwo zizareba urwego rumwe rwivugabuts umwe hari n'ubumenyi bukenee turi m mavugurura turi mu mavugurura ni iki twabonye ko ari ngombwa ntabwo twifuza kugira ibigo by'imitako ahubwo bigomba kujyana n'ireme ry'uburezi butangirwamo

text: “Turacyafite urugendo runini kugira ngo ibigo byacu bimere neza kandi ntitwabigeraho uruhare rwacu rutagaragaye nk’itorero ndetse hatariho ubufatanye bw’abayobozi b’ibigo, ababyeyi n’ubuyobozi bwa Leta.”
transcript: acyafite urugendo runini kugira ngo ibigo byatsu bimiye neza kandi ntitwabigeraho uruhare rwacu rutagaragaye nk'itorero ndetse atariho ubufatanye n'abayobozi b'ibigo ababyeyi n'ubuyobozi bwa leta

text: Pasiteri Rutagarama yashimye ubufatanye bwa Leta na ADEPR mu by’uburezi burimo kuba Leta itanga imishahara y’abarimu, ubutaka bwo kwaguriraho ibikorwaremezo n’ibindi.
transcript: pasiteri rutagarama yashimiye ubufatanye bwa leta na ade pea mu by'uburezi burimo kuba leta itanga imishahara y'abarimu ubutabuka bwo kwaguriraho ibikorwa remezo n'ibinzi

text: Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Intara y’Iburasirazuba, Dr Nyirahabimana Jeanne, yavuze ko uyu ari umusanzu ukomeye ADEPR izanye, witezweho ibisubizo by'ibibazo bisanzwe bihari.
transcript: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'intara y'iburasirazuba dr nyirahabimana jane yavuze ko uyari bo musanze ikomeye ad pr'izan witezweho ibisubizo by'ibibazo bisanzwe biharii

text: Ati “Igihe cyose uburezi bugiye gukorwaho n’abantu batandukanye ni ibintu biduha umusaruro. Iyo turebye ibiteganyijwe gukorwa muri iki cyumweru cy’uburezi turasanga hazaboneka ibisubizo byinshi by’ibibazo duhura na byo.”
transcript: ati igihe cyose burezi bugiye gukorwaho n'abantu batandukanye ni ibintu biduha umusaruro iyo turebya ibiteganyijwe gukorwa muri ki cyumweru cy'uburezi turasanga hazaboreka ibisubizo by'ibibazo duhura nabyo

text: Ubuyobozi bw’Itorero rya Pentekote mu Rwanda, ADEPR, bwatangaje ko mu mavugurura bwatangiye harimo gushyira imbaraga mu bizamura imibereho y’abaturage aho kwita ku ivugabutumwa gusa.
transcript: ubuyobozi bw'itorero rya pentekote mu rwanda ad pr bwatangaje ko mu mavugurura bwatangiye harimo gushyira imbaraga mu bizamura imibereho ry'abaturage aho kwita ku ivugabutumwa gusa

text: Mu bizakorwa harimo ubukangurambaga ku kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge n’inda zitateguwe mu banyeshuri, gusubiza mu ishuri abaritaye n’ibindi, ku nsanganyamatsiko igira ati “Uburezi bufite ireme, ishingiro ry’iterambere rirambye.”
transcript: mu bizakorwa harimo ubukangurambaga ku kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge nindazitateguwe mu banyeshuri gusubiza ishuri abaritaye n'ibinzi ku nsanganyamatsiko igize ko nsanganyamatsiko igira iki uburezi bufite ireme ishingiro ry'iterambere rirambye

text: Dr Nyirahabimana yavuze ko ari ubukangurambaga bwunganira ubundi, ubwo bufatanye bukaba ari bwo butanga umusaruro w’uburezi bufite ireme. Yasabye ADEPR gukomeza muri uwo murongo yizeza ko Leta na yo izakomeza gutanga umusanzu wayo.
transcript: dr nyirahabimana yavuze ko ari ubukangurambaga bwuganira ubunzi ubwo bufatanye bukaba ari bwo butanga umusaruro w'uburizi bufite ireme yasabye ade per gukomeza muri uwo murongo yiziza ko leta nayo izakomeza gutanga umusanzu wayo

text: Seneza Jean Paul uhagarariye Umuryango uvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu rubyiruko binyuze muri Siporo, Ambassadors Football, yavuze ko bidashoboka guteza imbere uburezi usize siporo inyuma ikaba ari yo mpamvu mu bigo by’amashuri bya ADEPR hashyizwemo gahunda yo kwigisha umupira w’amaguru.
transcript: seneza jean pouluhagarariye umuryango uvuga ubutumwa bwiza mu rubyiruko binyuze muri siporo ambasadasi fotbal'yavuze ko bidashoboka guteza imbere uburezi usize siporo inyuma ikaba ari yo mpamvu mu bigo by'amashuri bya deperi hashyizwemo gahunda yo kwigisha mu mupira w'amaguru

text: Itorero ADEPR rifite ibigo by’amashuri y’incuke, abanza n’ayisumbuye birenga magana atatu hirya no hino mu gihugu.
transcript: itorero ade per rifite ibigo by'amashuri y'inshuke abanza nayisumbuye birenga amagana atatu hirya no hino mu gihugu

text: Urukiko rw’Ubujurire mu Bwongereza rwateye utwatsi icyifuzo cy’abimukira n’imiryango yasabaga ko batakoherezwa mu Rwanda, ni icyemezo kije gishimangira icy’Urukuru cyafashwe mu cyumweru gishize.
transcript: rukiko rw'ubujurire mu bwongereza rwateye utwatsi icyifuzo cyabimukira n'imiryango yabasabaga ko batakoherezwa mu rwanda ni icyemezo kijje gishimangira icy'urukiko rcyafashwe mu cyumweru gishize

text: Ibi bisobanuye ko indege ya mbere izatwara abimukira izahaguruka kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya cumi nenye Kamena bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri,nk’uko byari biteganyijwe. Urukiko rwavuze ko politiki y’u Bwongereza yo kohereza abimukira mu bindi bihugu ifite ishingiro kandi ari inyungu rusange.
transcript: ibi bisobanuye ko indege ya mbere izatwara bimukira izahaguruka kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki icumi n'enye kamena binamakumyabiri na kabiri nk'uko byari biteganyijwe urukiko rwavuze ko politiki y'ubwongereza yo kohereza abimukira mu bindi bihugu ifite ishingiro kandi ari inyungu rusange

text: Urukiko rwavuze ko abantu cumi n'umwe ari bo bashobora kurira indege ya mbere ibajyanye i Kigali. Gusa umuryango Care4Calais,uri mu irwanya iyi gahunda wavuze ko abantu umunani ari bo bashobora kurira indege.
transcript: urukiko rwavuze ko abantu icumi ni umwe ariwo bashobora kwirinda indege ya mbere yibajyanye i kigali gusa umuryango wa kea fokalaus'uri uri mwirwanya iyi gahunda wavuze ko abantu umunani ari wo bashobora kuririnda indege

text: Mu cyumweru gishize, abarwanya gahunda yo kohereza abimukira mu Rwanda baratsinzwe kuko Urukiko Rukuru mu Bwongereza rwemereye guverinoma y’icyo gihugu kubikora.
transcript: mweru gishize abarwanya gahunda yo kohereza abimukira mu rwanda baratsinzwe kuko urukiko rukuru mu bwongereza rwemereye guverinoma y'icyo gihugu kubikora

text: Umubare w’abagombaga kugenda ku ikubitiro waragabanutse kuko ku byari biteganyijwe ko bari mirongo itatu na barindwi ariko inzitizi zatanzwe zishingiye ku mategeko agenga abimukira n’uburenganzira bwa muntu zituma bagabanuka.
transcript: umubare w'abagombaga kugenda ku ikubitiro waragabanutse kuko ku byayi biteganyijwe ko bari mirongo itatu nabarindwi ariko inzitizi zatanzwe zishingiye ku mati ku mategeko agenga bimukira n'uburenganzira bwa muntu zituma bagabanuka

text: Ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize hafashwe umwanzuro wo kutohereza abantu batandatu bari ku rutonde,aba bakurikira abandi makumyabiri na bo barukuweho mu mpera z’iki cyumweru. Ibi biratuma hasigara cumi n'umwe barimo bane bakomoka muri Iran, babiri bo muri Albania, umwe wo muri Syria, babiri bo muri Iraq. Abandi ntihahishuwe ubwenegihugu.
transcript: kuwa gaanu w'icyumweru gishize hafashwe umwanzuro w'uko kutohereza abantu batandatu bari ku rutonde aba bakurikira abandi bakumyabirihumubare wabagombaga kuwa gatau 'icymweru gishize hafashwe umwanzuro wo kutohereza abantu batandatu bari ku rutonde aba bakurikira abanzi makumyabiri nabo baharukuweho umumpez iki cyumweru ibi baratuma hasigara cumi n'umwe barimo bane bakomoka muri ilan babiri bo muri albania umwe wo muri siria biri babiri bo muri irack'abandi ntihahishuwe ubweneyigihugu

text: Umwanditsi wa BBC, Mark Easton, avuga ko bishoboka ko umubare ushobora gukomeza kumanuka kugera kuri zero mbere y’uko isaha yo guhaguruka kw’indege igera. Ku wa Gatanu abantu ijana na mirongo itatu bari bafite ubutumwa ko bashobora koherezwa mu Rwanda.
transcript: umwanditsi wa bibicy mark'eston'avuga ko bishoboka ko umubari ushobora gukomeza kumanuka kugera kuyizera mbere ko isa isaha yo guhaguruka kw'indege igera kuwa gatanu abantu ijana na mirongo itatu bari bafite ubutumwa bwo ko bashobora koherezwa mu rwanza

text: Nubwo hakomeje inkundura yo kwirukana abimukira mu Bwongereza, ntibibuza abandi kwinjira kuko ku cyumweru abagera ku ijana na cumi n'umwe binjiye bajyanywe n’ubwato buto butatu mu gihe abarenga igihumbi ari bo binjiye muri uyu mwaka wose.
transcript: nubwo hakomeje inkundura yo kwirukana abimukira mu bwongereza ntibibuza abandi kwinjira kuko kucyumweru abagera kujana na cumi n'umwe binjiye bajyanwe n'ubwato ubuto butatu mu gihe abarenga igihumbi aribo binjiye muri uyu mwaka wowese

text: U Rwanda rwagiranye amasezerano n’u Bwongereza agena ko aba bimukira bazajya bafatwa bakazanwa mu Rwanda, ababishaka bagahitamo gusubira mu bihugu byabo mu gihe n’abagaragaza ubushake bwo kurugumamo bafashwa kuhakomereza ubuzima.
transcript: u rwanda rwajyanye amasezerano n'ubwongereza agena ko ababimukira bazajya bafatwa bakazanwa mu rwanda ababishaka bagahitamo gusubira mu bihugu byabo mu gihe n'abagaragaza ubushake bwo kurugumamo bafashwa kuhakomeriza ubuzima

text: Ku ikubitiro, bwahaye u Rwanda miliyoni ijana na makumyabiri z'amayero azagirira akamaro izo mpunzi n’Abanyarwanda binyuze mu bikorwa by’uburezi mu mashuri yisumbuye, ay’imyuga ndetse n’andi mahugurwa mu masomo y’ubumenyingiro. Ibyo byiyongeraho ko bazafashwa kwiga kugera mu mashuri makuru na kaminuza.
transcript: uikubitiro bwahaye u rwanda miliyoni ijana namukumya abiza maelo'azagirira akamaro izo mpunzi n'abanyarwanda binyuze mu bikorwa by'uburezi mu mashuri yisumbuye ayimyuga ndetse n'andi mahugurwa mu masomo y'yubumenyingiro ibyo byiyongeraho ko bazafashwa kwiga kugera ku mashuri makuru na cami

text: Umuvugizi wungirije wa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Alain Mukuralinda, aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko u Rwanda rwamaze kwitegura kwakira aba bimukira kandi nibagera i Kigali bazafatwa neza nk’uko bigengwa n’amasezerano yo kubazana.
transcript: umuvugizi wungirija wa guverinoma y'u rwanda alen mukuralinda aherutse kubwira igihe ko u rwanda rwamaze kwitegura kwakira ababimukira kandi nibagera i kigali bazafatwa neza nk'uko bigengwa n'amasezerano yo kubazana

text: Ati “Icyiza ni uko twe mu Rwanda rwiteguye. Uyu munsi ndagira ngo mare impungenge z’uko niyo batubwira ngo haje 500 ba mbere, abo twabakira ariko nk’uko mubizi bazagenda baza mu byiciro kandi nta gutungurana kuzabamo.”

text: Muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, byatangajwe ko zahabu yageze ku madolari ya Amerika akabakaba mirongo inani kuri garama imwe, imibare isatira iyo hejuru yigeze kubaho muri Kanama 2020 ubwo icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyari cyarahagaritse ibikorwa byinshi mu nzego zinyuranye.

text: Nyuma y’aho u Burusiya bugabiye ibitero kuri Ukraine, impuguke mu by’imari n’ubukungu, zitangaza ko abashoramari bagerageje guhita bashaka ahantu bashora amafaranga yabo ku buryo baba bizeye.

text: Bitewe n’ihindagurika ry’ibiciro rikomeza kugenda rifata indi ntera hirya no hino ku Isi, byitezwe ko ibihugu byinshi bikomeza gushakira ibisubizo mu kugura no kwigwizaho zahabu mu rwego rwo kwizera ko bifite ikintu cy’agaciro mu gihe ibisigaye byose bigenda bigatakaza harimo n’ifaranga ubwaryo.

text: Statista yashyize ahagaragara urutonde rw’ibihugu bya Afurika byari byibitseho zahabu nyinshi mu bubiko kugeza mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe ku buryo mu bihe by’ihungabana ry’ubukungu n’itakazagaciro ry’ifaranga, ibyo bihugu bishobora kugira icyizere cyo kuzahura ubukungu no kurenga ibyo bihe byemye.

text: Ku mwanya wa mbere bibimburirwa na Algeria ifite toni za zahabu zigera ku ijana na mirongo irindwi nenye.

text: mu byo kugura impapuro mvunjwafaranga, ubucuruzi bw’Amadolari ndetse n’ubwa zahabu.Ku mwanya wa kabiri hazaho Afurika y’Epfo ibarirwa toni ijana na makumyabiri n'eshanu igakurikirwa na Libya ku mwanya wa gatatu na toni ijana na cumi na zirindwi mu gihe ku mwanya wa kane hazaho igihugu cya Misiri na toni mirongo inani n'ibice mirongo irindwi nabitatu.

text: U Bwongereza bumaze igihe bukomerewe n’ikibazo cy’abimukira binjira muri icyo gihugu mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko banyuze mu nzira izwi nka ‘English Channel’.
transcript: ubwongereza bumaze igihe bukomerewe n'ikibazo cyabimukira binjira muri icyo gihugu mu buryo bunyangije n'amategeko banyize mu nzira izwi nka inglischano

text: English Channel ni inzira y’amazi itandukanya Amajyepfo y’u Bwongereza n’Amajyaruguru y’u Bufaransa. Iyi nzira yifashishwa cyane n’abimukira binjira mu Bwongereza bakoresheje amato mato mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.

text: Kuva umwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri watangira kugeza muri Kanama uwo mwaka, u Bwongereza bwari bumaze kwakira abimukira ibihumbi bitatu magana acyenda na mirongo itanu banyuze muri ‘English Channel’.

text: Byageze muri Mata bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri u Bwongereza bwugarijwe cyane n’iki kibazo cy’abimukira kuko imibare yagaragaza ko uyu mwaka ushobora kurangira bwakiriye abimukira ibihumbi miringo itandato ugereranyije n’abarenga gato ibihumbi makumyabiri n'umunani bwakiriye mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri.

text: Umuvugizi wa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Yolande Makolo, yibukije Umuryango w’Abibumbye ko ibihugu byose bigira ubusugire bungana, ashimangira ko ubushotoranyi bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) bukwiye guhagarara burundu.
transcript: umuvugizi wa guvereninoma y'u rwanda yoland makono ibukije umuryango w'abibumbye ko ibihugu byose bigira ubusugire bungana ashimangira ko ubushotoranyi bwa ya republika iharanira demokayatiya congo rdicy bukwiye guhagarara burunzu

text: Makolo yasubizaga imvugo y’Umuvugizi w’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, Stephane Dujarric, ku bibera muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC), wagaragaje ko iki gihugu gishotorwa kandi kivogerwa. Muri make yakigaragaje nk’igihohoterwa gusa.
transcript: macolo yasubizaga imvugo y'umuvugizi w'umunyamabanga mukuru w'umuryango w'abibumbye stefan dujalick ku bibera muri republika iharanira demokanitiya congoaradicy wagaragaje ko iki gihugu gishotorwa kandi kivogerwa muyi make yakigaragaje nk'ink'igihohoterwa gusa

text: Dujarric yagize ati "Turongera gushimangira ko dushishikajwe n’ubusugire, ubwigenge, ubumwe ndetse n’ukutavogerwa kwa RDC kandi turamagana ibihugu byihisha inyuma y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro".
transcript: dujarick yagize ati turongera gushimangira ko dushishikajwe n'ubusugire ubwigenge ubumwe ndetse no kutavogerwa kwa aradici kandi turamagana ibihugu byihisha inyuma y'imitwe y'itwaje intwaro

text: U Rwanda rwahise rwibutsa ko bitari bikwiye gukomoza kuri RDC gusa ngo hirengagizwe ubushotoranyi ikomeje kurukorera. Ingabo z’iki gihugu zimaze gutera ibisasu ku butaka bw’u Rwanda inshuro nyinshi.
transcript: u rwanda rwahise rwibutsa ko bitari ikwiye gukomoza kurdc gusa ngo hirengagizwe ubusotanyi ikomeje kurukorera ingabo ziki gihugu zimaze gutera ibisasu ku butaka bwa u rwanda inshuro nyinshi

text: Ku wa cumi n'icyenda Werurwe no ku wa makumyabiri na gatatu Gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri,mu mirenge ya Kinigi na Nyange muri Musanze n’uwa Gahunga muri Burera ibisasu bya FARDC byakomerekeje abantu byangiza n’imitungo yabo.
transcript: twa cumi w'icyenda werurwe no kuwamakuminya nyagatatu gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri mu mirenge ya kinigi na nyange muri musanze n'uwa gahunga muri burera ibisasu bya fardese byakomekeje abantu byangeze n'imitungo yabo

text: Makolo yibukije Dujarric ko "Ubusugire bw’ibihugu byose burangana yaba ubw’u Rwanda cyangwa ubwa RDC. Ubwo RDC yateraga ibisasu ku butaka bw’u Rwanda ntiyari yashotowe, iki ni ikibazo gikomeye gifite ingaruka kandi kigomba guhagarara burundu".
transcript: macolo yibukije dudaric ko ubusugire bw'ibihugu byose burangana yaba ubwo u rwanda cyangwa ubwa ardicy ubwo rdic yateraga ibisasu ku butaka bw'u rwanda ntiyari ya shotoy iki ni ikibazo gikomeye gifite ingaruka kandi kigomba guhagarara burunzu

text: Yakomoje kandi ku bufatanye bwa Monusco n’ingabo za FARDC ziyunze na FDLR n’indi mitwe, anenga kuba izi ngabo z’Umuryango w’Abibumbye zimaze imyaka irenga makumyabiri muri RDC, zirebera ubu bufatanye bugamije kugera hafi y’u Rwanda ngo ruhungabanyirizwe umutekano.
transcript: yakomoje kandi ku bufatanye bwa monisco n'ingabo za fardece zinze na fr nindi mitwe anenga kuba izi ngabo z'umuryango w'abiyumbye zimaze imyaka irenga amakumyabiri muri rdicy zireberera ubu bufatanye bugamije kugera hafi y'u rwanda ngo ruru ruhungabanyirize umutekano

text: U Rwanda ruherutse gutangaza ko FARDC yivanze na FDLR ku buryo wagira ngo ni igisirikare kimwe, bakora inama bagahuza gahunda y’ibyo bagiye gukora noneho MONUSCO na yo ikaza ngo ije gushyigikira FARDC.

text: Byageze aho uyu mukobwa aratoroka ava muri urwo rugo ajya kwa nyirakuru, ariko aza gusanga atwite.

text: Hari kandi gushimuta abasirikare b’u Rwanda babiri bari ku burinzi byakozwe na FARDC ifatanyije na FDLR, ibi bikaba byaramenyeshejwe Guverinoma ya RDC, itsinda rishinzwe kugenzura uko imbibi z’imipaka zubahirizwa, EJVM n’abandi.

text: Mu nshingano za MONUSCO harimo kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro yose ariko yo ngo yahisemo kurwanya M. makumyabiri na gatatu yonyine, ifatanyije n’ingabo za RDC.
